title: A Meal Makes Her Forget
alternative_title: Boukyaku no Sachiko ; 忘却のサチコ
status: Boukyaku no Sachiko ; 忘却のサチコ
description:
Description :
        Meet Sasaki Sachiko. A 29 year old woman who works as an editor to a popular magazine. Her life is great, and soon it's going to be amazing because she's going to be married. Until suddenly .........

"Anyway, I need to eat so I could forget that day"



------

Published in Indonesia by Level Comics under title "A Meal Makes Her Forget"

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2: Full Speed! With Toruko Rice! (In Nagasaki)
Chapter 1: Miso Stewed Mackerel For A New Beginning
